vk.methods.docs module¶

class vk.methods.docs.Docs(vk: VK, category: str)¶

Bases: vk.methods.base.BaseMethod

async add(owner_id: int = None, doc_id: int = None, access_key: str = None)¶

Copies a document to a user’s or community’s document list. :param owner_id: ID of the user or community that owns the document. Use a negative value to designate a community ID. :param doc_id: Document ID. :param access_key: Access key. This parameter is required if ‘access_key’ was returned with the document’s data.

async delete(owner_id: int = None, doc_id: int = None)¶

Deletes a user or community document. :param owner_id: ID of the user or community that owns the document. Use a negative value to designate a community ID. :param doc_id: Document ID.

async edit(owner_id: int = None, doc_id: int = None, title: str = None, tags: list = None)¶

Edits a document. :param owner_id: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID. :param doc_id: Document ID. :param title: Document title. :param tags: Document tags.

async get(count: int = None, offset: int = None, type: int = None, owner_id: int = None)¶

Returns detailed information about user or community documents. :param count: Number of documents to return. By default, all documents. :param offset: Offset needed to return a specific subset of documents. :param type: :param owner_id: ID of the user or community that owns the documents. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

async get_by_id(docs: list = None)¶

Returns information about documents by their IDs. :param docs: Document IDs. Example: , “66748_91488,66748_91455”,

async get_messages_upload_server(type: str = None, peer_id: int = None)¶

Returns the server address for document upload. :param type: Document type. :param peer_id: Destination ID. “For user: ‘User ID’, e.g. ‘12345’. For chat: ‘2000000000’ + ‘Chat ID’, e.g. ‘2000000001’. For community: ‘- Community ID’, e.g. ‘-12345’. “

async get_types(owner_id: int = None)¶

Returns documents types available for current user. :param owner_id: ID of the user or community that owns the documents. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

async get_upload_server(group_id: int = None)¶

Returns the server address for document upload. :param group_id: Community ID (if the document will be uploaded to the community).

async get_wall_upload_server(group_id: int = None)¶

Returns the server address for document upload onto a user’s or community’s wall. :param group_id: Community ID (if the document will be uploaded to the community).

async save(file: str = None, title: str = None, tags: str = None)¶

Saves a document after [vk.com/dev/upload_files_2|uploading it to a server]. :param file: This parameter is returned when the file is [vk.com/dev/upload_files_2|uploaded to the server]. :param title: Document title. :param tags: Document tags.

async search(q: str = None, search_own: bool = None, count: int = None, offset: int = None)¶

Returns a list of documents matching the search criteria. :param q: Search query string. :param search_own: :param count: Number of results to return. :param offset: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.
